Headline: #26 South Shore Express and #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute near Ewing/100th
ShortDescription: 26 and 30 buses temp. rerouted NB: Ewing, 100th, Avenue L, 98th, and Ewing; SB: Ewing, 98th, Avenue L, and Ewing, due to police activity at Ewing/100th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express and #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Ewing/100th, due to police activity.

Northbound buses will operate via Ewing, 100th, Avenue L, 98th, and Ewing.

Southbound buses will operate via Ewing, 98th, Avenue L, and Ewing.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute near Lake/Ridgeland
ShortDescription: 86 buses temp. rerouted NB: Ridgeland, Ontario, Cuyler, and Lake; SB: South Blvd, Ridgeland, Lake, Cuyler, Ontario, and Ridgeland, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Lake/Ridgeland, due to street blockage.

Northbound buses will operate via Ridgeland, Ontario, Cuyler, and Lake.

Southbound buses will operate via South Blvd, Ridgeland, Lake, Cuyler, Ontario, and Ridgeland.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Westbound Reroute near North/ Sheffield
ShortDescription: Westbound 72 North  buses are temporarily rerouted via North,Halsted,Division,Elston, and North Ave. due to, street blockage near North/ Sheffield.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #72 North   buses are temporarily rerouted via North,Halsted,Division,Elston, and North Ave. due to, street blockage near North/ Sheffield.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
